com.zeitheron.hammercore.client.gui

Class GuiFluidTank

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • com.zeitheron.hammercore.client.gui.GuiFluidTank

  • public class GuiFluidTank
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
    A simple texture-less fluid tank rendering with tooltip support.

      • GuiFluidTank

        public GuiFluidTank(int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidTank tank)
        Constructs a new tank renderer. Call under GuiScreen.initGui()
        Parameters:
        x - the X position of the tank
        y - the Y position of the tank
        width - the width of the tank
        height - the height of the tank
        tank - the fluid tank to be rendered.
